html: (2 Nephi 18:14)."And he shall be for a sanctuary; but for a stone of stumbling and for a rock of offence." God will be a "security for those who trust him, but dismay and suffering for unbelievers." (LDSKJ, Isaiah 8:14, footnote a.) Christ is the "stone of Israel." (D&C 50:44; DCE, 566.) The Book of Mormon prophet Jacob prophesied: "I perceive by the workings of the Spirit which is in me, that by the stumbling of the Jews they will reject the stone upon which they might build and have safe foundation." (Jacob 4:15.)
